article.title: BAE Systems Awarded Contract To Reset M113 Vehicles
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: BAE Systems has received a $32 million contract modification from the U.S. Army's TACOM Life Cycle Management command to reset 417 M113 vehicles. Under the contract, the company will refurbish the vehicles by replacing old and damaged equipment with upgraded components and restoring the vehicles to pre-combat condition.
